member.name: T:Windows.System.UserProfile.AccountPictureKind
member.summary: Allows you to request a specific image type when using GetAccountPicture.
member.deprecated: Use User instead of UserInformation. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.AccountPictureKind.LargeImage
member.summary: Indicates you want the large image for the user's account.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.AccountPictureKind.SmallImage
member.summary: Indicates you want the small image for the user's account.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.AccountPictureKind.Video
member.summary: Indicates you want the video for the user's account.

member.name: T:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult
member.summary: A result that is returned when you try to set the image for a user account.
member.deprecated: Use User instead of UserInformation. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult.ChangeDisabled
member.summary: Indicates that the picture was not set because the AccountPictureChangeEnabled property is disabled, or the user cancelled the consent prompt.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult.Failure
member.summary: Indicates the picture or video was not set.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult.FileSizeError
member.summary: Indicates the picture was not set because the file size was too large.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult.LargeOrDynamicError
member.summary: Indicates that the picture was not set because the picture was too large.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult.Success
member.summary: Indicates the picture was successfully set.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetAccountPictureResult.VideoFrameSizeError
member.summary: Indicates that the video was not set because of its frame size was too large.

member.name: T:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetImageFeedResult
member.summary: Specifies the result of a call to LockScreen.RequestSetImageFeedAsync

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetImageFeedResult.ChangeDisabled
member.summary: The feed was not set because the lock screen image slide show is disabled by group policy.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetImageFeedResult.Success
member.summary: The image feed was set successfully.

member.name: F:Windows.System.UserProfile.SetImageFeedResult.UserCanceled
member.summary: The operation was canceled by the user.

member.name: T:Windows.System.UserProfile.UserInformation
member.summary: Represents information about the user, such as name and account picture.
member.deprecated: Use User instead of UserInformation. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: P:Windows.System.UserProfile.UserInformation.AccountPictureChangeEnabled
member.summary: Determines if the user's account picture can be changed.
member.returns: True if the user's account picture can be changed; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Windows.System.UserProfile.UserInformation.NameAccessAllowed
member.summary: Allows you to see if your app is allowed to access the user's information.
member.returns: True if your app is allowed access to the AccountPictureChanged event, and is allowed to retrieve user information by using the GetAccountPicture, GetDisplayNameAsync, GetDomainNameAsync, GetFirstNameAsync, GetLastNameAsync, and GetSessionInitiationProtocolUriAsync methods. Otherwise, this property is false.

member.name: E:Windows.System.UserProfile.UserInformation.AccountPictureChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the user's image or name changes.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.UserInformation.GetAccountPicture(Windows.System.UserProfile.AccountPictureKind)
member.summary: Gets the account picture for the user.
member.deprecated: Use User instead of UserInformation. For more info, see MSDN.
member.param: An enumeration that you can use to determine what type of image you want (small, large, and so on).
member.returns: An object that contains the image.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.UserInformation.GetPrincipalNameAsync
